content: I was gonna say something when Sara fell out, but fifty dollars is fifty dollars
newTitle: Countdown: Inspiration4 Mission to Space | Netflix Official Site
newsContent: Mike and his wife Sara went to the state fair every year, and every year Mike would say, "Sara, I'd like to ride in that airplane."....

content: Sara always replied, "I know, Mike, but that airplane ride costs fifty dollars, and fifty dollars is fifty dollars."
